disp-quote.p: ‘It’s a natural thing, something we are born into. When it rains, I as person do not have the ability to stop the rain it’s God’s will.’ (05-KM-Ikageng-4:38)
‘Yes. So I don’t have that belief I can change the climate because of it’s natural.’ (03-SS-Ikageng-6.22) (when asked if the climate is God’s thing)
